body_html:
Sadly we can't accept this as-is because it breaks the capability of loading any meta graphs which were saved before this change.

Instead for now it's safer to put the registration in your model core.

Instead for now it's safer to put the registration in your model core.
body:
Sadly we can't accept this as-is because it breaks the capability of loading any meta graphs which were saved before this change.

Instead for now it's safer to put the registration in your model core.
